Build ID: I20070503-1400

Steps To Reproduce:
When debugging, you cannot display any result that contains 'primitive.class'.
For example:
public String formatReturnType(Class returnType) {
  if (returnType.equals(void.class)) { ** breakpoint
    return "nothing";
  }
  return returnType.getName();
}

if I select void.class, I get an error. This also happens when I select the complete condition. arrays (int[].class) produce the expected results.
See the stacktrace below.
